title: Black Friday Dilemma
body:
I worked in retail for a while (Not anymore) and I an conflicted about going out in the morning in shopping. I hate the fact that people have to miss thanksgiving to come in to work and then through the entire night. However I know that dealing with customers makes the day go fast and people can make a fat paycheck because of black Friday.

Do you guys think its worth it? Personally I liked the paycheck from working it, but if I had a choice I might have said no.
